title: Can anyone review my singing for a K-pop audition?  - Quora

response.answer_text: I just finished listening to it ^^ My review is- You have a clear voice, making it easy to make out the words you’re saying, which is amazing! Although I have to say, if it feels like you’re putting a lot of pressure on your vocals, do not try and exceed further. It will strain and will cause breaks when singing. Practice makes better! I believe you have a wonderful voice and hope you will continue singing! I advise, if you’d like more control of your nice voice you should see a professional vocal coach to help you do that. They will also help you put less pressure on your vocals and help you sing deeper more refined notes as well. You do have a good control over your voice, but sometimes when people sing higher the less control they have. I read in the comments that you don’t have a vocal coach, so I recommend finding one! To help with tone, control, and pressure control. I know you’ll do great in the entertainment industry! I hope you found this useful! ^^
